name: CaliforniaHighwayConditions
0:
”Alexa, ask California Highway Conditions about 88”
”Alexa, ask California Highway Conditions to get information about highway 101”
”Alexa, ask California Highway Conditions about highway 50”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: california highway conditions
des: You can ask about any California highway including interstate and state routes. The information is provided by Caltrans agency and includes details about road closures due to maintenance, winter conditions, etc. This skill does not provide traffic information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
